This is a shrinking/giantess story based on my original characters from my DeviantArt comics. I will draw chapters that I like so don't be afraid to add something :D (and I will give credit to the writers of the chapters) http://capinplanet.deviantart.com/

Randy and the girls decide to take a vacation. You choose where they go and what happens.

You are Randy. 22 years old, blond hair, white, 1 inch tall, a few ounces. He is an average (aside from the size) guy from the city. He is taken "care" of by his neighbors. Although his neighbors would rather have some fun with him.

Girls going with him: (pictures will be added as I draw them)

Roxxy (Roxanne) - 22 years old, brown hair, white, 5'5", 135 lbs. She is a nice girl with a sweet, loving personality. She secretly likes you. She has nice boobs, and a fairly big booty. College student/student teacher. Roxxy relaxing: http://capinplanet.deviantart.com/#/d491axd
